item.title: Contact
item.author: thecogcatholic@outlook.com (Darren)
item.description: Send an Email Email me at TheCOGCatholic (an Outlook.com address). Here is my GPG key IF you wish to encrypt your email. To encrypt emails using… Thunderbird: See video “Encrypt your Personal Email with Thunderbird.” Webmail Use Mailvelope with its browser extension. Android Use K-9 Mail from Google Play or F-Droid. (Alternative) Just use the “Online PGP tool” at aliceandbob.io. (Paste the text of my public PGP/GPG key into the right side of the screen.
